text: Clara Marin (born 17 March 1997) is a Chilean track and field athlete who specializes in the 100 metres hurdles and 400 metres hurdles. She won the 2014 South American Youth Championships in Athletics on 400 m hurdles and got second place on the [100 m hurdles. She won the 2015 South American Junior Championships in Athletics on 100 m hurdles, achieving the championship record with a time of 13.48 seconds. She holds the youth and junior Chilean record in the 100 m hurdles and the youth Chilean record of the 400 m hurdles. ==Personal bests== {| class="wikitable" |- !Category !100 m hurdles !400 m hurdles |- |Youth |13.53 (+0.5) Cali, Colombia |1.01.21 Cali, Colombia |- |Junior |13.48 (-0.4) Cuenca, Ecuador | |- |Adult |13.48 (-0.4) Cuenca, Ecuador | |} ==References== * Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Chilean female hurdlers
title: Clara Marín
